answers.answer: Hi, you need be to get urine tested for routine microscopy as well as culture and sensitivity as this may be due to urinary tract infection, kidney stones, prostatitis etc. Drink plenty of fluids to flush out.Are you having burning urination or fever? Any history  of diabetes?

question: My urine has looked cloudy and powdery lately.  Why is this??
title: Powdery Urine
